name: Moon Sakura's gift
description: “The Sakura Rain in the early spring is my favorite view of all season.” Use it to exchange a Moon Sakura Costume.

name: Moon Whisper
description: [Moon Whisper]: the latest work of Vettel Moura, the 14th president of House Moura, the most famous perfume family of the land. It's said that the president was inspired by the moon one night and created this mesmerizing fragrance.

name: Mooncake
description: The moon in lunar August 15th is the biggest and the most round in a year. It is said that the wishes made in front of the mid-autumn moon can be realized.

name: Mooncake Blueprint
description: The moon in lunar August 15th is the biggest and the most round in a year. It is said that the wishes made in front of the mid-autumn moon can be realized.

name: Mooncake Recipe
description: This should be a recipe for some special food.
